oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First days in states of mask mandates
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jacobs, Philip
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This database contains the first day of a mask order for each state. There are two fields: (1) State name (2) Date of first mask mandate in state. The internet address which identified the source of data is embedded in Field 2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social Sciences
COVID-19 masks
